wait.name: Wait
wait.description: Wait and do nothing this turn.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description: Stomp the ground, dealing 1d6 bludgeoning damage to all adjacent enemies and knocking them prone.

reckless_attack.name: Reckless Attack
reckless_attack.description: Make a powerful double attack that deals +2 damage each, but you take -2 to hit and +2 AC for 2 rounds.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Enter a furious rage, gaining +2 to damage and +2 to hit for 5 rounds. You take -1 AC while raging.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwind.description: Swing your weapon in a wide arc, attacking all enemies within reach.

roundhouse.name: Roundhouse Kick
roundhouse.description: Make a powerful kick that strikes all enemies for 1d4 + 1 + level/3 bludgeoning damage.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: Sweeping attack strikes an adjacent enemy if lethal damage is dealt.

shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.description: Bash an enemy with your shield, dealing 1d6 damage and stunning them for 1 turn.

daylight.name: Daylight
daylight.description: Create a sphere of bright light that deals 1d4 radiant damage to all enemies, reveals Hidden creatures and blinds enemies for 2 rounds.

sunburst.name: Sunburst
sunburst.description: Create a burst of radiant light.

anoint.name: Anoint
anoint.description: Grant all allies +2 to hit and saves for 5 rounds.

prepare_charge.name: Prepare Charge
prepare_charge.description: Prepare to charge on your next turn, gaining +2 to hit and +2 damage.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Charge at an enemy, dealing 3d8+1 damage. Each level adds +1 to damage.

set_spear.name: Sets Spear
set_spear.description: Brace your spear to intercept a charging enemy, dealing 3d8 damage and granting +4 to hit when they charge you next turn.

overwatch.name: Overwatch
overwatch.description: Make an attack of opportunity against the first enemy that melee attacks you or an ally before your next turn.

missile.name: Magic Missile
missile.description: Fire three magical bolts that automatically hit and deal 1d3 damage each (more bolts and damage at higher levels).

burning_hands.name: Burning Hands
burning_hands.description: Unleash a cone of fire, dealing 1d6 damage to all enemies in the area.

shocking_grasp.name: Shocking Grasp
shocking_grasp.description: Deliver a jolt of electricity, dealing 1d4 damage and stunning the target for 2 rounds.

chain_lightning.name: Chain Lightning
chain_lightning.description: Strike multiple enemies with lightning, dealing 1d6 damage to each.

charm.name: Charm Person
charm.description: Attempt to charm an enemy, making them friendly towards you for 3 rounds.

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description: Next attack that misses you triggers a punishing counterattack. Grants +3 evasion and +1 AC for the next round.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Focus on dodging attacks, granting you evasion and enhanced AC.

blur.name: Blur
blur.description: Become blurred, granting you a 50% chance to avoid attacks for 3 rounds.

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.description: Lull enemies into a magical slumber.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurl a fiery ball that explodes, dealing 6d6 fire damage to all enemies in the area.

vicious_mockery.name: Vicious Mockery
vicious_mockery.description: Hurl a string of insults at an enemy.

inspire.name: Inspire
inspire.description: Inspire your allies, granting them a +2 bonus to attack rolls for the next 3 rounds.

poison_weapon.name: Poison Weapon
poison_weapon.description: Coat your weapon in poison for your next 2 attacks.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Taunt an enemy, forcing them to target you on their next turn.

mass_curse.name: Mass Curse
mass_curse.description: Curse all enemies, reducing all their stats by 1.

maul.name: Maul
maul.description: Make a powerful attack that deals 1d6 + strength modifier extra damage and inflicts Bleed on a successful hit.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: Attack an enemy from behind, dealing 1d6 extra damage on a successful hit.

poison_bite.name: Poison Bite
poison_bite.description: Bite an enemy, dealing 1d4 damage and poisoning them.

poison_cloud.name: Poison Cloud
poison_cloud.description: Release a cloud of toxic gas.

psionic_blast.name: Mind Melt
psionic_blast.description: Invade minds of all enemies, dealing 1d6 psychic damage and stunning them.

life_drain.name: Life Drain
life_drain.description: Drain life from an enemy, healing yourself for damage dealt.

lightning_strike.name: Lightning Strike
lightning_strike.description: Strike random enemies with lightning, dealing 1d8 damage and paralyzing them for 1 round.

drench.name: Drench
drench.description: Drench an enemy, reducing their attack rolls by 2 for 3 rounds.

enrage.name: Rage
enrage.description: Enter a frenzied state, gaining +2 to damage rolls and +1 toHit but degrading AC for by 3.

acid_arrow.name: Acid Arrow
acid_arrow.description: Fire an arrow of acid, dealing 1d4 damage and applying Acid Burn.

acid_spray.name: Acid Spray
acid_spray.description: Spray a cone of acid, dealing 2d6 damage to all enemies in the area and applying Acid Burn.

ray_of_frost.name: Ray of Frost
ray_of_frost.description: Fire a ray of frost, dealing 1d4 damage and reducing the target's speed by 10 feet for 3 rounds.

summon_animal.name: Call Animal Companion
summon_animal.description: A friendly animal comes to your aid in battle.

summon_elemental.name: Summon Elemental
summon_elemental.description: Summon a random elemental to fight for you.

summon_monster.name: Summon Monster
summon_monster.description: Summon a random monster (beast or fey type) to fight for you.

summon_undead.name: Summon Undead
summon_undead.description: Summon a random undead creature to fight for you.

summon_lich.name: Summon Lich
summon_lich.description: Summon a powerful lich to fight for you.

paralyzing_touch.name: Paralyzing Touch
paralyzing_touch.description: Touch an enemy to paralyze them for 2 rounds.

dig_in.name: Dig In
dig_in.description: Brace yourself, gaining +2 AC and +2 to saving throws for 4 rounds.

protection_from_evil.name: Protection from Evil
protection_from_evil.description: Grant immunity to charm and fear for 6 rounds.

dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
dispel_magic.description: Remove charm, cursed, paralyzed and magical stun effects from a target; also removes positive arcane buffs.

smoke_screen.name: Smoke Screen
smoke_screen.description: Create a smoke screen that grants all allies within it evasion and 4 AC for 3 rounds.

dirty_trick.name: Dirty Trick
dirty_trick.description: Perform a dirty trick to blind or entangle an enemy, giving them -4 to hit for 2 rounds.

hunters_mark.name: Hunter's Mark
hunters_mark.description: Mark an enemy, giving them -2 AC and +1d4 damage from all attacks for 5 rounds.

ensnare.name: Ensnare
ensnare.description: Entangle an enemy with vines, reducing their speed and giving them -2 to hit for 3 rounds.

silence.name: Silence
silence.description: Create an area of silence, preventing spellcasting for 3 rounds.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: Reduce dexterity of all enemies by 5 for 4 rounds.

disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
disintegrate.description: Disintegrate an enemy, dealing 10d6 force damage.

engulf.name: Engulf
engulf.description: Absorb an enemy into the ooze, dealing 6d6 acid damage over 3 rounds.

confuse.name: Confuse
confuse.description: Confuse an enemy, causing them to act randomly for 3 rounds.

detonation.name: Detonation
detonation.description: Countdown to a fiery explosion, dealing 4d6 fire damage to all enemies in a 10-foot radius.

arrow_volley.name: Arrow Volley
arrow_volley.description: Shoot a volley of arrows at all enemies, dealing 3d4 piercing damage.

inflict_disease.name: Inflict Disease
inflict_disease.description: Inflict a debilitating disease on an enemy, causing them to take 1d4 necrotic damage at the end of each of their turns.

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: Unleash a deadly plague upon all enemies, dealing 2d6 necrotic damage and applying Disease.

lich_summoning_ritual.name: Black Ritual
lich_summoning_ritual.description: Begin the ritual to summon a powerful lich in 3 rounds.

death.name: Death
death.description: Instantly kill an enemy with a failed save.

disable.name: Deactivate Device
disable.description: Attempt to disable a mechanical trap or device.

reflection.name: Reflection
reflection.description: Create a magical shield that reflects some incoming damage.

spellturning.name: Spellturning
spellturning.description: Create a magical barrier may reflect spells back to their caster.

deathtouch.name: Death Touch
deathtouch.description: Touch an enemy to attempt to kill or curse them.

blade_barrier.name: Blade Barrier
blade_barrier.description: Create a wall of spinning blades that damages enemies passing through it.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.description: Call down divine judgment on an enemy.

onHeal.description: being healed while marked for judgment

holy.name: Holy
holy.description: Smite your foes with holy energy.

chant.name: Chant
chant.description: Bolster yourself with a holy chant.

turn_undead.name: Turn Undead
turn_undead.description: The dead recoil from your holy presence.

resist_fire.name: Resist Fire
resist_fire.description: Grant an ally resistance to fire damage for 5 rounds.

aegis.name: Aegis of Faith
aegis.description: Ward against all effects for 4 rounds.

consecrated_ground.name: Consecrated Ground
consecrated_ground.description: Consecrate the ground, damaging enemies who attack or cast spells near you.
